title: Stocks to buy or sell: Dharmesh Shah of ICICI Sec suggests buying BEL shares on February 16
summary: Benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty 50 dropped over 1% due to a selloff in metal, IT, and commodity sectors amid weak global markets. Disappointing earnings and AI disruption fears added to the negative sentiment, with the Sensex closing at 82,626.76 and Nifty 50 at 25,471.10.

title: China's stock bull run falters with corporate earnings set to underwhelm
summary: China's earnings season is already shaping up as a disappointment. Fourth-quarter pre-announcements from more than 2,000 mainland-listed A-share companies show negative alerts outnumber positive ones
